detectors.description:
PlotXToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlotXToken__1.sol#75-80) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PlotXToken__1.sol#77)

detectors.description:
